replies.msg: There is a boy I really like in my school. He is very handsome and he has all the traits I was looking for in a boy. Yet, we do not talk much in public. Everytime I have tried to talk to him, my mind just suddenly became blank and I couldn't think of any subject to bring up in the conversation. We sort of have a few conversations only when he was asking me about the homework. Even though we do not talk much in public, we chatted sometimes on tg. I always thought he answered me on tg was out of politeness. I really want to have a real conversation with him in public and tell him how I felt about him and once again, I was always afraid to do that. I am so confused. I really want to tell him how I felt but I cared about his response to that. I don't want our distance to move farther away.
小學作文分享
